Uses of Class
org.netbeans.api.editor.caret.EditorCaretEvent

  • Packages that use EditorCaretEvent 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.editor.caret
    The Editor Caret API opens up the editor to give information about its carets and to manipulate them.

    • Uses of EditorCaretEvent in org.netbeans.api.editor.caret

      Methods in org.netbeans.api.editor.caret with parameters of type EditorCaretEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void EditorCaretListener.caretChanged(EditorCaretEvent evt)
      Notification about change in terms of caret addition/removal or movement.
